basic.floral_language:
Echeveria derenbergii
Floriography: cute, goodly, beautiful
A small cute and beautiful succulent, fleshy oval leaves with red tips, arranged in a rosette, like a blooming lotus flower, in a cool season on sunny days, leaf edges turn fresh red, very attractive.
Likes sunny places, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, yellow color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color tender green, when sunny leaf edges turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
